Module fi.tuni.progthree.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Class PrimaryController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp.PrimaryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PrimaryController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class. Shows the current weather and weather forecast for the city.
Author:
Tommi Paavola, Sofia Mustaj√§rvi

  • Constructor Details

    • PrimaryController

      public PrimaryController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed. Fulfill gridpane with labels and add all labels to arraylists.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • setCurrentWeather

      public void setCurrentWeather(String cityName)
      Sets the current weather for the chosen location.
      Parameters:
      cityName - Name of city as String. (Case-insensitive)

    • setDayForecast

      public void setDayForecast(String cityName)
      Sets the day recap forecast. Includes daily max and min temperature as well as daily total rainfall.
      Parameters:
      cityName - Name of city as String. (Case-insensitive)

    • setHourForecast

      public void setHourForecast(String cityName)
      Sets the hourly forecast to the UI. Includes temperature, wind velocity and direction, description as a png image and rainfall amount.
      Parameters:
      cityName - Name of city as String. (Case-insensitive).

    • setForecast

      public void setForecast(String cityName)
      Uses the iAPI to call for the hourly forecast of the specific city, and saves it first to a json file and then to a data structure. For more info, see classes iAPI and WeatherDataMap.
      Parameters:
      cityName - Name of city as String. (Case-insensitive)

    • changeForecastDay

      public void changeForecastDay(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Changes the day of hourly forecast.
      Parameters:
      event - mouse clicked event

    • changeAllUnits

      public void changeAllUnits()
      Changes units from imperial to metric or vice versa. Changes are: Temperature between C and F, wind velocity between m/s and mph, and rain amount between mm and inch

    • changeSpecificUnits

      public void changeSpecificUnits(ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Label> list)
      Changes the units of a list of labels between metric and imperial. Changes are: Temperature between C and F, Wind velocity between m/s and mph, and Rainfall between mm and inch
      Parameters:
      list - list of labels of which the units should be changed.
